name: Abi's Way to Heaven
description:
Oh no!

Due to unfortunate events, Abi is dead!
But luckily she has you to help her.

Guide her through both sides of her purgatory,
Though Hell and Heaven,
and help her fight her Inner Demons...

To hopefully get her a ticket to Paradise

Programmation, music and art by jijigri. Thanks to Fiddle for setting up the Itch.io page with me.

The game was created for the first edition of the CCC Jam. Thanks to the hosts, it was so much fun !

And sincere thanks to anyone who will play the game. And if you get the good ending, please let me know, I'll be impressed !
